description:
Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

هل تحتار في اختيار فيلم أو مسلسل لمشاهدته الليلة؟ دع عجلة الساحرة تختار لك! تطبيق متكامل يجمع بين تتبع الأفلام والمسلسلات مع لمسة رومانسية فريدة.


المميزات الرئيسية:

عجلة السحرية


دوّر العجلة واترك الحظ يختار دراما الليلة

رسوم متحركة ساحرة ومؤثرات احتفالية

اختيار ذكي من قائمتك المفضلة


مكتبة شاملة للأفلام والمسلسلات


تصفح آلاف الأفلام والمسلسلات

معلومات مفصلة مع التقييمات والمراجعات

تصنيفات متنوعة: رائجة، شعبية، الأعلى تقييماً

بحث سريع ودقيق


تنظيم مثالي لقوائمك


قائمة المفضلة لأجمل ما شاهدت

قائمة المشاهدة لما تنوي مشاهدته

تتبع ما شاهدته بالفعل

إحصائيات شخصية مفصلة


اختبار المعرفة السينمائية


اختبر معرفتك بعالم السينما والدراما

أسئلة متنوعة وممتعة

تحديات يومية ونقاط تنافسية

شارك نتائجك مع أصدقائك



واجهة داكنة أنيقة وعصرية

ألوان حمراء دافئة تعكس

تجربة مستخدم سلسة وممتعة

دعم كامل للغة العربية


تحديثات مستمرة


محتوى محدث يومياً

أحدث الإصدارات السينمائية

تنبيهات للحلقات الجديدة


لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.

- Title: عجلة تتبع دراما Premium

- Length: Weekly ($3.99), Monthly ($5.99), or

Lifetime ($9.99)

- Content: Unlimited access to all premium features including ad-free experience, unlimited lives, double points, exclusive themes, and advanced statistics

- Auto-renewable subscription

- Payment charged to iTunes Account at confirmation

- Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled 24+ hours before period ends

- Manage subscriptions in Account Settings

It is the one-stop platform to discover and book concerts, sporting events, cultural shows, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, auctions, and more. Whether you are in Riyadh, Jeddah, the Eastern Province, or anywhere else in the Kingdom, webook.com connects you to everything exciting. With updated listings, verified bookings, and a simple interface, having fun and planning trips has never been easier.

Events & Tickets: Book tickets for concerts, festivals, sports matches, comedy shows, exhibitions, and cultural events across Saudi Arabia. From headline concerts at Riyadh Season and football games in the Roshn Saudi League to family attractions in Jeddah or workshops in Dammam, if you can book it, it is here. Follow artists, athletes, and venues to get notifications on new events. All tickets are official with no markups, and you can resell securely if plans change. Skip scalpers and queues – your tickets live safely on your phone, ready to scan at the gate.

Flights & Hotels: Plan your travel with ease. Book flights with top airlines, compare schedules, and reserve hotels or resorts at great rates through our partner almosafer. Whether flying Riyadh–Dubai, a business trip to Jeddah, or a weekend staycation in Abha, webook.com makes it simple. Filter by price, rating, or location. Choose luxury resorts, city hotels, or budget stays – all with secure payments and instant confirmation. With integrated flights and hotels search, planning your trip has never been smoother.

Restaurants & Dining: Turn outings into complete experiences by reserving tables at top restaurants. Discover Saudi Arabia’s best dining, from fine dining in Riyadh to cafés in Jeddah and trendy spots in Khobar. With integration from Servme, when you book a concert or football match you will get recommendations for nearby restaurants. Pair your event with the right meal – a romantic dinner, family lunch, or casual hangout. Book events and restaurants together in one app.

Shop & Auctions: For fans of sports, music, and culture, webook.com offers a memorabilia shop and exclusive auctions in one place. Browse and buy signed jerseys, autographed posters, and official souvenirs from your favorite teams and artists. Join live or timed auctions to bid on rare items, luxury goods, and collectibles you will not find elsewhere. During select events, take part in real-time auctions for unique pieces such as signed guitars or rare football boots. All memorabilia is verified authentic, and every auction is secure and transparent, giving you confidence as a buyer or collector.

Why webook.com?

All-in-One Platform: Tickets, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, and auctions in one app.

Trusted by Millions: Millions of users in Saudi Arabia already use webook.com.

Official Partnerships: Authorized ticketing partner for major events, including Roshn Saudi League matches.

Personalized Discovery: Recommendations based on your interests and bookings.

Secure Payments: Options like Mada, Apple Pay, credit cards, with instant confirmation.

24/7 Support: Multilingual service in Arabic and English.

From massive concerts in Riyadh to luxury dining in Jeddah, from football in Dammam to rare collectibles through auctions, webook.com is the super-app that brings it all together.

Download webook.com – fun things to do today and unlock a world of entertainment, travel, dining, shopping, and more. Discover new experiences, book what you love, and make memories with a few taps. From concerts in Riyadh to flights for your next holiday, restaurants in Jeddah to memorabilia and auctions, webook.com has it all. Having fun has never been this simple – everything you need is in one app.

Your next adventure starts here. With webook.com, you will never miss the experiences that matter most.

app_name: MX Player : All in One Player
description:

Enjoy the audio and video files with all of the features such as play, pause, list creation, saving, and shortening by title, artist, album, and so on.
MX Player: All Media Player is intended to improve the user experience when listening to and watching videos.
MX Player: All Media Player-mp3 music app supports Next, Previous, Rewind, Pause, Fast Forward, and a Queue of songs.

MX Player: All Media video player HD is used to play all videos in all formats. HD is used to play different types of video formats like AVI, MP3, WAV, AAC, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, FLAC, 3GP, M4V, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV, etc.

MX Player: All Media video player On startup, it automatically scans and displays all your videos from your phone. Using the MX Player: All Media video player, you can play your high-resolution HD movies without any quality loss. It is the most powerful and easy-to-use player that supports almost all types of video. Video Player HD is a really good app to control your video volume and brightness without any quality loss. It is the most powerful and easy-to-use player that supports almost all types of video. Max video player is a really good app to control your video volume and brightness.

It supports auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments, and gestures to control volume, brightness, and seeking.

MX Player: All Media Show new web series and new action movies. Max Player HD displays the most recent shows, action movies such as Bollywood, and all of the most popular web series. Max Player downloads various video formats.

Enjoy every moment of watching any video. Max Player High Quality supports all video formats, including ultra HD video files, and plays them within high-definition videos. Max Player Video is the best HD video player for iOS tablets and phones. 

Max Player Full is the best player for showing videos and movies in HD.

▶  Max Player HD Key Features lists all video files.
▶  Max player HD gets video directly from an SD card.
▶  Supports high-resolution HD video movies.
▶  Supports all popular video codec formats.
▶  Max Player HD searches all videos on your phone automatically.
▶  Swipe control for volume, brightness, and seeking
▶  You can lock and unlock the screen by pressing the icon.

▶  Plays all formats of videos.

Search your favorite mp3 songs enjoy, listen, share this awesome app

MX Player: All Media Player is the most complete video player.

developer: Turkuvaz Radyo TV Haberlesme ve Yayincilik A.S.
description:
atv uygulaması ile Türkiye’nin en çok izlenen TV kanalı her an her yerde!
atv izleyicileri için hazırlanan özel tasarımla, canlı yayına, sevdiğin dizilere, uygulamaya özel videolara ve herkesten önce izleyebileceğin dizi fragmanlarına kolayca ulaşabilirsin!
En sevilen programları atv uygulamasında kolayca izle. En sevilen gündüz kuşağı programları hafta içi her gün atv’de! Müge Anlı ile Tatlı Sert, Esra Erol’da ve Mutfak Bahane izlemek günün her anında atv uygulamasıyla mümkün.
**
atv mobil uygulaması sayesinde günün tüm gelişmelerini yakalamak ise çok kolay. Kahvaltı Haberleri, Gün Ortası, atv Ana Haber ve atv’de Hafta Sonu programlarıyla günün nabzını yakalayabilirsiniz. Hemen atv uygulaması indir merak edilen haberleri anında izle.
**
Senin dizin hangisi? Bir Gece Masalı Salı akşamları atv ekranına geliyor. Çarşamba akşamı Kuruluş Osman rüzgarının estiği atv’de, Perşembe günleri ise Başka Bir Gün var. Cuma akşamları Zembilli izleyicisiyle buluşurken Cumartesi gününün yıldızı ise Can Borcu. Pazar günleri ise Kardelenler atv ekranlarında. Tüm atv dizilerini mobil uygulamadan izle, takip et ve detaylara hakim olma şansını kaçırma!
**
Nihat Hatipoğlu sohbetleri ile atv izleyicisinin karşısına çıkmaya devam ediyor. Dini program kategorisinde Nihat Hatipoğlu ile Kur’an ve Sünnet, Nihat Hatipoğlu ile Dosta Doğru ve Nihat Hatipoğlu Sorularınızı Cevaplıyor programları her an uygulamadan takip edilebiliyor.
**
‘Kim Milyoner Olmak İster?’ yarışması da atv mobil uygulamasından izlenebiliyor. Ayrıca ‘Milyoner başvuru formu’ da atv mobil uygulamasında yer alıyor.
Sevdiğin dizi mi başlıyor?
Yayın akışından izlemek istediğin dizi programın yanındaki  ‘alarm’a tıkla. Dizin veya programın başladığında haberin olsun!
Keyifli seyirler!

A popular poetry competition program organized by the Saudi Broadcasting Corporation, which aims to support poetry and discover poetic talents.
Al Raya Poet application provides users with viewing all episodes of Al Raya Poet application, watching the live broadcast of the episode, the latest news, videos and photos, and viewing all the contestants of Al Raya Poet application.

Inspire your children to uncover their unique interests
Help your children explore video content that they love and that parents trust, in an app made just for children. With easy navigation tools and a suite of features, you can help your children spend time online uncovering new interests, unleashing their imagination and building their confidence in their own unique world.

Help your children grow at their own pace
Your children are unique, so they should only see content that they're ready to explore. Decide what videos will help them make the most of their time online, then personalise individual profiles using custom content filters as they grow.

– Help your youngest children learn their ABCs, nurture their curiosity and more in 'Preschool' mode.
– Expand your children's interests to songs, cartoons or DIY crafts in 'Younger' mode.
– Give your older children the freedom to search popular music and gaming videos in 'Older' mode.
– Or, hand-pick the videos, channels and collections that your children can see in 'Approved content only' mode.

Rewatch videos and bond over favourites
Quickly find your children's favourite videos and the content that you've shared with them in the 'Watch it again' tab.

Shape your children's viewing experience with parental controls
Parental control features help you limit what your children watch, and better guide their viewing experience. Our blocking process aims to help keep videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and safe – but each family's preferences are unique. Don't like a video or channel, or see inappropriate content? Flag it for our team to review.

Set a screen-time limit
Encourage your children to take a break in between exploring content. Use the 'Timer' feature to freeze the app when screen time is up so that your children can apply their new skills to the real world.

See important information
– Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience for your family.
– Children may see commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.
– See the Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link for information on our privacy practices for signing in with a Google Account.
– If your children use the app without signing in with their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.
